title: In vitro antimicrobial activity of Thai stick cannabis Hang Kra Rog Phu Phan (Cannabis sativaL.), sugar leaves extract against pathogenic bacteria.
abstract: Cannabis sativaL. is aware of a rich source of bioactive substances with various structures that exhibit pharmacological activity in the central nervous system, cardiovascular, cerebrovascular, respiratory, reproductive, and gastrointestinal systems.
journal: Journal of advanced veterinary and animal research
